### Collectives

LinkedEarth collaborates with several working groups and initiatives:

- [**PAGES2k**](https://pastglobalchanges.org) - Past Global Changes 2k Network
- [**Iso2k**](https://pastglobalchanges.org) - Isotopes 2k Network
- [**CoralHydro2k**](https://pastglobalchanges.org) - Coral Hydro 2k Network
- [**Temp12k**](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-020-0445-3) - Temperature 12k Database
- [**PALMOD**](https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-12-1053-2020) - Paleoclimate Modelling
